content: [AUCTION] Mixed Media Embroidery Artwork - "BullCoin"______________________________________________________________Condition: MINT 100%HandMade by 5KsanaArtwork  "BULLCOIN" embroidered with physical Bitcoin coins, decorated with beads, rhinestones and Swarovski stonesEmbroidery is a decorative needlecraft that uses yarn or thread on canvas or fabric, but can also incorporate materials such as beads, pearls, or ribbon.Material: -   piece of fabric;-   beads;-   sequins;-   crystal;-   metallic theards;-   physical coins (2 pcs.) of  Bitcoin ( Denarium 2015)-   wood frame .Dimension: wide – 60 cm; height – 65 cm.About ME https://5ksana.art/about/ You can see my other artworks BITCOINART on my website https://5ksana.art/category/bitcoinart/ BTC_______________________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________Bid Format: Bids only in BTCReserve Price:  0.04 BTCStarting Bid: 0,04 BTC                             Bid Inc.: 0.001 BTCAuction Ends:  Friday, Jule  01th  12:00 PSTDelivery: International – Free (EMS).
